ComicInfo.Title: Another Fine Day in Dr. Frankenstein's Laboratory; Dangerous Toys; Other Magazine Covers Madonna Will Be Appearing on...; Yo, Santa!; The List of the Mosthokum; Madonna's Top 86 (Give or Take 79) New Year's Resolutions; Goodies for Transylvanian Gourmets!; Cracked's Personalized Remotes; Spies and Saboteurs Hit the Shopping Mall; Cracked Guide to Enjoying the Great Outdoors; Self Help Books for Pre-Schoolers; Have Your Next Greasy Meal on Cracked; Proper Football Safety Techniques the Maury Stinkmuller Way; The Mighty Dorks; The Continuing Adventures of Aladdin; Under Sludge; One Fine Day in Dr. Frankenstein's Laboratory
